long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get instant summaries and overviews directly in your browser with Glance!

Glance is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing quick, AI-powered summaries of web content. Perfect for researchers, students, and anyone looking to streamline their online reading, Glance offers an innovative way to understand and interact with information on the web.

Features:

Instant Summaries: With a simple click, Glance uses advanced AI technology to generate concise summaries of the web page you're viewing. Whether it's a long article, a detailed report, or a busy forum, get the gist of it in seconds.
Seamless Integration: Glance integrates smoothly into your browser, offering its features unobtrusively yet always accessible when you need them.
Customizable Settings: Tailor Glance to suit your needs. Adjust the length of summaries, choose when and where summaries appear, and more.
Privacy-Focused: We value your privacy. Glance processes content locally on your browser, ensuring your data stays private.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a sleek, minimalist design that is both easy on the eyes and intuitive to use.
Whether you're conducting research, studying, or just browsing the web, Glance is your go-to tool for quick, efficient content comprehension. Spend less time reading and more time understanding with Glance!
